name: The Legend of Quatsi
description: Made as an example game for my Unity Halloween Asset Pack, The Legend of Quatsi is a 3rd person action platformer / shooter based around my real life cat, Pixel. In this amazing adventure an mad scientist tries to capture all the cats in the world and turn them into tacos. Pixel, a machine gun wielding badass, is the only cat brave enough to stop this crazed scientist.
